participant_1.background:
I read my favorite comic books to take my mind off of things.
I enjoy getting my nails done as a way to relax and pamper myself.
I drive a car that is both reliable and fuel-efficient, so I can get to my business and music lessons on time.
I work as an online tutor during the hours that I am awake.
my parents are still married.

participant_2.background:
I think my family would be disappointed, but they would still love me.
I had a long career as an educator and mentor, but now I am retired and enjoying my golden years.
i never knew my dad.
My favorite book is The Little Prince because it reminds me of my dog.
i am a rapper.

content.text: I am doing well! I am just getting ready to start my day.
What do you do for a living?
I am an online tutor, so I work from home.
That sounds like a great job! I am a retired educator, so I understand the work from home life.
What was your favorite part of being an educator?
I loved working with students and helping them learn.
That is so great! I love helping students learn too.
Do you have any children of your own?
No, I don't have any children.
I never had any children of my own, but I have a lot of nieces and nephews.
That is great! I love spending time with my nieces and nephews.
I do too! They keep me young!
I am glad to hear that!
